name: Vanilla Dreams Soy Candle
description: A luxurious soy candle with warm vanilla notes that creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere. Hand-poured with premium soy wax and natural cotton wick for a clean, long-lasting burn.

name: Lavender Serenity Aromatherapy Candle
description: Relax and unwind with our premium lavender aromatherapy candle. Made with pure essential oils and natural soy wax for the ultimate relaxation experience.

name: Ocean Breeze Pillar Candle
description: Bring the refreshing scent of the ocean into your home with this beautiful pillar candle. Features notes of sea salt, marine air, and coastal florals.

name: Cinnamon Spice Jar Candle
description: Warm your home with the comforting scent of cinnamon and spices. Perfect for autumn evenings and holiday celebrations. 40-hour burn time.

name: Tea Light Candle Set (12 pack)
description: Set of 12 unscented tea light candles perfect for creating ambient lighting. Made with natural paraffin wax and cotton wicks. 4-hour burn time each.
